attributes.action: send emergency relief to Burma in the wake of Cyclone Nargis - ensuring that all the money gets to the people and not siphoned off to the military government's treasury.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr. Gordon Brown,

More than 10 000 are estimated to have died in Cyclone Nargis.  SPDC (military government) of Burma could have minimised the damage by warning and taking precautions.  They can prevent suffering now by taking effective action - but we doubt that they would, given the disregard for citizens' welfare that they have demonstrated recently.

US Campaign for Burma states : "Money and humanitarian assistance should only be provided to trusted, international humanitarian organizations who can reach the victims of the cyclone directly."

We, the undersigned, call on the UK government to send the aid IMMEDIATELY and through trusted channels.
